anime: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru.
quote: People who don't work hard don't have the right to be envious of the people with talent. People fail because they don't understand the hard work necessary to be successful.

People aren't complicated. We work hard when we know that we'll get something in return, and we try to work even harder if that something is our own improvement.

If everyone were perfect, there would be no need to look out for others. Sympathy or love is needed because people are imperfect. A perfect human cannot love anyone.
